items.sentence: I wanted to be a singer, but I was told I should learn to play the drums.
We waited for Tom at the library for half an hour, but he didn't show up.
When it's windy, the leaves of the old oak rustle and its branches creak.
If you go out for dinner with your family, how much does it usually cost?
It wasn't till the next morning that we learned that Tom had been killed.
